subtitle: Welcome to AFM SMILER, a Scale Model Interactive Learning Extended Reality Toolkit for Atomic Force Microscopy. This is a companion tool for the book: Active Probe Atomic Force Microscopy: A Practical Guide on Precision Instrumentation. AFM SMILER is composed of eight modules named as: cantilever mechanics, probe transducer, controller tuning, contact mechanics, system overview, virtual imaging, multimodal operation, and hardware interaction. Please select the module you would like to explore to get started.
